ModMetaData.name: Clothing Sorter
ModMetaData.author: Mlie
ModMetaData.description:
[img]https://i.imgur.com/WAEzk68.png[/img]
- A mod that sorts apparel based on various properties - Option to sort by tech-level as well as layer - Options for subcategories based on armor-value and psyfocus - Option to set what armor-value apparel should be put in the armored category
- Works with all apparel, modded and vanilla - Generates categories for custom apparel-layers - Safe to add/remove from saves - Verified to work with CE
